original_text: The sons of Asher according to their clans: of Imnah, the clan of the Imnites; of Ishvi, the clan of the Ishvites; of Beriah, the clan of the Beriites.
korean_text: 아셀 자손의 종족들은 이러하니 임나에게서 난 임나 종족과 이스위에게서 난 이스위 종족과 브리아에게서 난 브리아 종족이며

sentences.original_text: The sons of Asher according to their clans
of Imnah, the clan of the Imnites
of Ishvi, the clan of the Ishvites
of Beriah, the clan of the Beriites
